message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for someone with your insights. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,600,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this price better reflects the value I see in the product.

Bob, thanks for your counter-offer.  I understand your perspective on the value. However, I've had significant interest in this product, and to be fair to other potential buyers, I'm looking for a price closer to $1,450,000.  I believe this price point reflects the true market value.

I appreciate your understanding of the market value, but I'm still not convinced that $1,450,000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1,300,000 for the product.
